Class Car

  • java.lang.Object
    • Car

  • public class Car
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a simple Car for the game Racer.

    • Field Summary

      static java.lang.String WHEEL_COLOUR

      • WHEEL_COLOUR

    • Constructor Detail

      • Car

        public Car(double x,
           double y,
           GameArena a)
        Creates a new Car, at the given location.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position on the screen of the centre of the car.
        y - The y position on the screen of the centre of the car.
        a - The GameArena upon which to draw this car.

    • Method Detail

      • setXPosition

        public void setXPosition(double x)
        Changes the position of this car to the given location
        Parameters:
        x - The new x positition of this car on the screen.

      • setYPosition

        public void setYPosition(double y)
        Changes the position of this car to the given location
        Parameters:
        y - The new y positition of this car on the screen.

      • getXPosition

        public double getXPosition()
        Determines the position of this car on the screen
        Returns:
        The x position of the centre of this car on the screen.

      • getYPosition

        public double getYPosition()
        Determines the position of this car on the screen
        Returns:
        The y co-ordinate of the centre of this car on the screen.

      • setXSpeed

        public void setXSpeed(double s)
        Sets the speed of this car in the X axis - i.e. the number of pixels it moves in the X axis every time move() is called.
        Parameters:
        s - The new speed of this car in the x axis

      • setYSpeed

        public void setYSpeed(double s)
        Sets the speed of this car in the Y axis - i.e. the number of pixels it moves in the Y axis every time move() is called.
        Parameters:
        s - The new speed of this car in the y axis

      • move

        public void move()
        Updates the position of this car by a small amount, depending upon its speed. see setXSpeed() and setYSpeed() methods.

      • isTouching

        public boolean isTouching(RoadSegment s)
        Determines if this car is touching the given RoadSegment.
        Parameters:
        s - The segment of road to test against.
        Returns:
        true of this car is touching the given road segment, false otherwise.
